CmdLine: pacman --noconfirm --needed -S       base-devel       boost       cmake       clang       git       openmp       openssh       yaml-cpp   && paccache -rfk0
Commands.Name: run

CmdLine: git clone --recursive https://github.com/Cognexa/cxtream.git   && mkdir -p cxtream/build && cd cxtream/build   && cmake -DBUILD_TEST=OFF ..   && make -j4 && make install && ldconfig   && cd ../../ && rm -r cxtream
